mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `t_user_infomation`( `user_code`, `user_name`, `user_account`, `user_pass`, `user_id_card`, `user_sex`, `user_role`, `user_phone`, `user_integral`, `user_email`, `is_delete`, `create_time`, `create_user`, `version`, `user_image` ) VALUES( #{userCode}, #{userName}, #{userAcc}, #{userPass}, #{userIdCard}, CAST(#{userSex} AS SIGNED), 3, #{userPhone}, 0, #{userEmail}, 0, now(), #{userCode}, 0, #{imagrUrl} )
mapper.select: select tuser.user_code userCode, tuser.user_account userAcc, tuser.user_role userRole, tuser.user_image userImageUrl, tuser.user_name userName, tuser.user_phone userPhone, tuser.user_sex userSex from t_user_infomation tuser where tuser.user_code = #{userCode} and tuser.is_delete = 0
select driver_code userCode, driver_acc userAcc, driver_image userImageUrl, name userName, phone userPhone from t_driver_information_manage where driver_code = #{userCode} and is_delete = 0
select shop_code from t_store_information where is_delete = 0 and shop_con_user = #{userCode} limit 0,1
